chunk:
ATTITUDE Oceanly Phyto-Calm Eye Cream

Brand: ATTITUDE

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, undecane, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, jojoba esters, vitis vinifera (grape) seed oil, glycerin, tridecane, caprylic/capric triglycerides, aqua / water / eau, behenyl

water / eau, behenyl behenate, polyhydroxystearic acid, acacia decurrens flower wax, polyglycerin-3, sucrose laurate, sucrose stearate, euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax, propanediol, glycogen, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, hydrolyzed soy protein, ecklonia cava extract, rice amino acids, caprylhydroxamic acid, glyceryl caprylate

, glyceryl caprylate, hydrolyzed adansonia digitata (baobab) seed extract, proline

Warnings: Store at a temperature below 90 F. Avoid contact of the packaging with water. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.
